title: "Calculating differences\ files scanned: 1" forever (patching issue)

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I tried the DNS thing, i tried the firewall thing, i tried deleting folders and files, i tried REINSTALLING ffs, and STILL i get the same mistake over and over, it doesnt even start downloading files, it writes the same thing, on every server, i just cant get to play the league of legends in any way

I've submitted a ticket, but i got no answer for 16 hours already, so im posting this here

replies.body: So the solution for me was to run the game through the VPN program, like cyber ghost. Just thought to leave it here if anyone need it

This might not necessarily be an issue with your connection or requiring a repair, but actually a security setting that's preventing the patcher from scanning files.    Use our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to go over each step and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.

It's a common issue Riot is trying to fix right now.
Got it too
Alright, thanks, at least im not the only one
